title: How to get involved?
content: It's still early days and all help is very appreciated. Some of the easiest ways to contribute are:

title: What is FPV?
content: FPV means First Person View and refers to the perspective or point of view when flying a FPV freestyle or a racing drone (quadcopter). Pilots use goggles to receive a live video feed, transmitted from the drone's camera which also translates into a 'flying from the cockpit' feeling.

As a broader term, FPV is an awesome fast-paced hobby, allowing you to fly drones (quads), planes, wings using a radio transmitter and enjoying the out of body experience through the first person view camera.
Have a look at this video to get an idea, but don't let my poor flying skills fool you and definitely checkout some of these excellent, excellent pilots:

title: Why fly FPV and who is this for?
content: Cause it's fun! And it's for everyone! No, seriously! FPV is fun and can be enjoyed by people of all ages. There are all sorts of drones - from the most timid micros to the fastest beasts that punch a whole in the skyâ„¢ (Stew).

title: Where does FPVTIPS fit in?
content: FPVTIPS wants to be there when you need information. The maybe one slight downside of the hobby is that it could seem a bit intimidating at first. Don't worry though, it's not that hard and no, you don't need to know all the stuff.
It would be nice to have a place to search for beginner friendly information. It would also be nice to find easily the exact answers to your questions. Enter, FPVTIPS!
